Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.world.Map

extends java.lang.Object
    A set of tiles representing a map.

    Ches Burks

      • addStructure

        public void addStructure(Structure struct,
                int x,
                int y)
        Adds the structure to the map. This will replace anything already placed. This methods automatically repopulates the collision boxes after placing.
        Parameters:
        struct - The structure to add
        x - The x position to start at
        y - The y position to start at

      • repopulateCollisionBoxes

        public void repopulateCollisionBoxes()
        Populates the array of collision boxes for solid tiles. This creates AABB's for each tile, and tries to create the largest AABB for groups of solid tiles as it can. This may not find any boxes.

      • clearCollisionBoxes

        public void clearCollisionBoxes()
        Clears out the HashSet of collision boxes.

      • getCollisionBoxes

        public AxisAlignedBoundingBox[] getCollisionBoxes()
        Returns the array of collision boxes for solid tiles. This may be empty.
        Returns:
        The array of collision boxes

      • getCollisionBoxesHashSet

        public java.util.HashSet<AxisAlignedBoundingBox> getCollisionBoxesHashSet()
        Returns the HashSet of collision boxes for solid tiles. This may be empty. This method is faster than getCollisionBoxes(), as it is stored internally as a hashset and thus does not need conversion.
        Returns:
        The array of collision boxes
